languages.text: "И, ежели так, то они все предстанут пред судом наравне с остальными. Я не стану истреблять служителей веры без разбору лишь за прегрешения сбившегося с пути пастыря".

traits.locale_text: "И, ежели так, то они все предстанут пред судом наравне с остальными. Я не стану истреблять служителей веры без разбору лишь за прегрешения сбившегося с пути пастыря".

languages.text: "And if that is so, they will all face the same trial as the others. I will not indiscriminately massacre servants of the faith for the deeds of their preacher who strayed from the righteous path."
languages.original_text: "И, ежели так, то они все предстанут пред судом наравне с остальными. Я не стану истреблять служителей веры без разбору лишь за прегрешения сбившегося с пути пастыря".

traits.locale_text: "And if that is so, they will all face the same trial as the others. I will not indiscriminately massacre servants of the faith for the sins of their pastor who strayed from the righteous path."
"And if that is so, they will all face the same trial as the others. I will not indiscriminately massacre servants of the faith for the sins of their pastor who strayed from the righteous path."

"And if that is so, they will all face the same trial as the others. I will not indiscriminately massacre servants of the faith for the transgressions of their pastor who strayed from the righteous path."

"And if that is so, they will all face the same trial as the others. I will not indiscriminately massacre servants of the faith for the transgressions of their pastor who strayed from the righteous path."
"And if that is so, they will all face the same trial as the others. I will not indiscriminately massacre servants of the faith for the deeds of their preacher who strayed from the righteous path."
"And if that is so, they will all face the same trial as the others. I will not indiscriminately massacre servants of the faith for the deeds of their preacher who strayed from the righteous path."

languages.text: “如果真的是这样，那他们所有人都要面临相同的审判。我不会因为他们的领袖偏离了正道，就不分青红皂白，屠杀所有虔信的仆人。”
languages.original_text: "And if that is so, they will all face the same trial as the others. I will not indiscriminately massacre servants of the faith for the deeds of their preacher who strayed from the righteous path."

traits.locale_text: “如果真的是这样，那他们所有人都要面临相同的审判。我不会因为牧师偏离了正道，就不分青红皂白，屠杀所有虔信的仆人。”

languages.text: 「そうなれば、彼らは他の者達と同じ裁判にかけられる。正しい道から外れた祭司の行いのために、その信者達を無差別に虐殺したりはしない」
languages.original_text: "And if that is so, they will all face the same trial as the others. I will not indiscriminately massacre servants of the faith for the deeds of their preacher who strayed from the righteous path."

traits.locale_text: 「そうなれば、彼らは他の者達と同じ裁判にかけられる。正しい道から外れた祭司が起こした罪のために、その信者達を無差別に虐殺したりはしない」

languages.text: «Y si es así, todos ellos se enfrentarán al mismo juicio que los demás. No masacraré indiscriminadamente a siervos de la fe por los actos de su predicador, que se desvió del camino correcto».
languages.original_text: "And if that is so, they will all face the same trial as the others. I will not indiscriminately massacre servants of the faith for the deeds of their preacher who strayed from the righteous path."

traits.locale_text: «Y si es así, todos ellos se enfrentarán al mismo juicio que los demás. No masacraré indiscriminadamente a siervos de la fe por las transgresiones de su pastor que se desvió del camino correcto».

languages.text: "Und wenn dem so ist, dann bekommen sie alle denselben Prozess wie die anderen. Ich werde nicht willkürlich Diener des Glaubens für die Taten ihres Predigers massakrieren, der vom rechtschaffenen Pfad abgekommen ist."
languages.original_text: "And if that is so, they will all face the same trial as the others. I will not indiscriminately massacre servants of the faith for the deeds of their preacher who strayed from the righteous path."

traits.locale_text: "Und wenn dem so ist, dann bekommen sie alle denselben Prozess wie die anderen. Ich werde nicht willkürlich Diener des Glaubens für die Fehltritte ihres Pastors massakrieren, der vom rechtschaffenen Pfad abgekommen ist."

languages.text: « Si tel est le cas, ils seront jugés au même titre que les autres. Je ne massacrerai pas sans discernement des serviteurs de la foi simplement parce que leur pasteur s'est écarté du droit chemin. »
languages.original_text: "And if that is so, they will all face the same trial as the others. I will not indiscriminately massacre servants of the faith for the deeds of their preacher who strayed from the righteous path."

traits.locale_text: « Si tel est le cas, ils seront jugés au même titre que les autres. Je ne massacrerai pas sans discernement des serviteurs de la foi simplement parce que leur pasteur s'est écarté du droit chemin. »

languages.text: "Öyle bile olsa diğerleriyle aynı şekilde yargılanacaklar. Doğru yoldan çıkmış vaizleri yüzünden inancın hizmetkârlarını ayrım yapmaksızın katletmeyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "And if that is so, they will all face the same trial as the others. I will not indiscriminately massacre servants of the faith for the deeds of their preacher who strayed from the righteous path."

traits.locale_text: "Öyle bile olsa, diğerleriyle aynı şekilde yargılanacaklar. İnancın hizmetkârlarını, doğru yoldan çıkmış vaizleri yüzünden, ayrım yapmaksızın katletmeyeceğim."
